title: The Little Medical Concubine of the God of War - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Revenge   Transmigration
author: 可乐棒棒糖
description:
In the 24th century, as a powerful evil doctor, living among dead and fleshy bones, she was the sole 13th generation descendent of an ancient martial family. 

Though born with a silver spoon, she died accidentally and her soul transmigrated into the second daughter of the Yun family of Qian yuan mainland. 

She lamented, “How can this life be so tragic? My father doesn’t love me and my mother is missing. It’s too cruel!”

However, since she was already here, those who owe her must repay a hundredfold!

But what is the matter with the regent who keeps popping up from time to time?>
